short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export your own cstno.com lists (or the overall leaderboard) as a Letterboxd-friendly CSV file you can manually import.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export your own cstno.com lists (or the overall leaderboard) as a Letterboxd-friendly CSV file you can manually import. Uses The Movie Database IDs for linking to Letterboxd: https://letterboxd.com/about/importing-data/
